text: wma aetytm min maal 'aw ghyrh kthyr 'aw qalil ttsdqwn bih abtigha' mardat allah 'aw awjbtm ealaa 'anfusakum shyyana min maal 'aw ghyrh, fa'iina allah yelmh, wahu almuttalie ealaa nyatkm, wasawf ythybkm ealaa dhalik. wman mane haqa allah fahu zalm, walzaalimun lays lahum 'ansar ymnewnhm min eadhab allh
